title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Roman Kuteynikov
raw_text: Cover Art  Migration    Roman Kuteynikov was born in Russia, Voronezh. At the age of 14 he moved to Italy, in Parma, where he attended the art school of Paolo Toschi. In about 2012 he discovered the digital and decided to dedicate his life to drawing in a professional way and for this he started attending the Academy of Fine Arts in Bologna, where he graduated in 2017 in comics and illustration. He currently works as a concept artist and freelance illustrator in the publishing and videogame industries.
text:
Cover Art
Migration
Roman Kuteynikov was born in Russia, Voronezh. At the age of 14 he moved to Italy, in Parma, where he attended the art school of Paolo Toschi. In about 2012 he discovered the digital and decided to dedicate his life to drawing in a professional way and for this he started attending the Academy of Fine Arts in Bologna, where he graduated in 2017 in comics and illustration. He currently works as a concept artist and freelance illustrator in the publishing and videogame industries.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Migration by Roman Kuteynikov
